title: Workshop on Early Spanish Language Education and Translanguaging OER-Based Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Spanish communication skills and understanding of early childhood education practices
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing translanguaging strategies applicable to early Spanish language education for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to design lessons using translanguaging techniques in early Spanish language education environments.
Develop bilingual Spanish-English educational materials utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER).
Design assessment tools applying connection strategies between learners' native language and target language.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
